body:
Builds and passes all unit tests on macOS 10.14.3 with Clang 10.0.0.

- [x] Add MySQL 8.0.15
- [x] Specify versions of CMake and GMake required on each OS
- [x] Convert boost to 'build' type dependency
- [x] Add missing dependencies on ncurses and openssl
- [x] Add dependencies required for running unit tests
- [x] Add dependencies required for building from a git checkout

I still need to test this on Cray.
title: Add latest version and missing dependencies of MySQL
